But consensus prevalence TPOab treat pregnancy level thyroid-stimulating hormone ( TSH ) normal . Thyroid hormones regulator mitochondrial activity research group previously show subclinical hypothyroidism affect mitochondrial activity . DOC.brief_title: Relation Between Subclinical Hypothyroidism Outcome Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: The aim estimate relationship SH spontaneous abortion and/or obstetric complication mitochondrial dysfunction . 1 . A prospective study data General Suburban Population Study Naestved analyze measure frequency subclinical hypothyroidism ( SH ) TPOab . SH define raise serum concentration TSH > 3,4 mU/l normal level free T4 T3 . A cut-off 60 mU/l use TPOab . 2 . To estimate relationship SH TPOab early spontaneous abortion pregnancy outcome . Inclusion woman experience minimum one early spontaneous abortion 20 50 year old : 50 woman SU and/or TPOab-positive 50 woman normal level TSH TPOab-negative . The basal oxygen consumption measure mitochondrial function determine flow cytometry . 3 . To estimate prevalence gestational hypertension pre-eclampsia among pregnant woman subclinical hypothyroidism estimate mitochondrial function . A minimum 100 pregnant woman without thyroid disease diabetes include . Early spontaneous abortion define abortion 12 week gestation . Obstetrics complication define pre-eclampsia ( proteinuria , oedema , hypertension ) , pregnancy-induced hypertension , placental insufficience ( IUGR ) abruption , preterm delivery stillbirth . Those complication analyze data obstetric journal . Measurement oxygen consumption : Respiratory gas analysis volume measurement perform canopy connect triple V ( flow⁄gas sensor ) Oxycon apparatus ( Jaeger Oxycon Champion , Breda , Netherlands ) . The equipment calibrate test compensate ambient condition air pressure , temperature humidity . Basal VO2 measure least 6 hour fast . Before test individual resting pulse establish participant rest 30 min chair . The test room quiet light subdue . The subject give sufficient time become familiarized equipment procedure test initiate rest pulse achieve . Oxygen consumption measure uptake per minute remain constant . Measurements perform repeat period 30 second 20 minute . The method record oxygen uptake within-day variation 0.8 % day-to-day variation 5.8 % . Measurement mitochondrial mass ( MM ) mitochondrial membrane potential ( MMP ) flow cytometry : Venous blood drawn patient EDTA Vacutainer tube . From patient 2 sample 100 µl blood process . One unstained control tube one stain analyze . The sample stain add 1 µl Pacific Blue Mouse Anti-Human anti-CD14 ( BD Biosciences , Denmark ) mixed . The tube incubate 30 minute room temperature protect direct light subsequently wash . The stained cell resuspend 890 µl PBS add 10 µl 1 µM MTG ( MitoTracker Green FM , Invitrogen A/S , Denmark ) 100 µl 1 µM TMRM ( Tetramethylrhodamine methyl ester , Invitrogen A/S , Denmark ) . All stock solution dissolve DMSO ( dimethyl sulfoxide ) work solution dilute PBS . After mix sample incubate 30 minute room temperature dark .
